entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Partly cloudy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 03 January 2023
